attributes.action: Stop Telford from becoming part of Birmingham city region
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop this idea by Telford councillors from joining the Birmingham City region.
This idea can only lead to Telford loosing out financialy and becoming a bigger dumping ground for over spill as it did in the early seventy`s.
If this idea is allowed to go ahead it will cost the Council tax payers dearly and Telford will loose what is left of its character and it`s status.
